message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth at least $80 to you. What do you think?
I'm not sure I can afford $110, I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $100.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm still a bit hesitant, I was thinking more along the lines of $92
